name: Forbidden Love (itch) (ABZO)
description:
The game is about a fierce warrior Khel in a prehistoric tribe but
others don’t acknowledge him as an equal. They know him to be the son
of a slave woman captured in a raid. Khel loves the daughter of the
tribe’s chief Sierel , even though he knows it is unthinkable for a
servant like him to have her. Nonetheless, he endures all the
wrongdoing, the discrimination and follows his heart. During his
journey, he will encounter tough obstacles and discover painful
truths. Will he win the love of his life? And at what cost?

Controls:

WASD =  movement

Space  = Jump

LMB = attack

Q = open quest menu
